dcterms:creator: Li Deng
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digit images used for machine learning research, consisting of 70,000 images of digits from 0 to 9.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Jian Chen

dcterms:description: A dataset used as a trusted clean dataset for training models in the De-Pois defense framework.
dcterms:title: Trusted Clean Dataset (Sc)

dcterms:creator: Toan Tran
Trung Pham
Gustavo Carneiro
Lyle Palmer
Ian Reid
dcterms:description: An augmented dataset created by combining generated samples with clean samples to enhance model training.
dcterms:title: Augmented Dataset (Saug)

dcterms:creator: Mehdi Mirza
Simon Osindero
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset created using conditional generative adversarial networks (cGAN) to mimic the distribution of a trusted clean dataset.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Dataset (created using cGAN)
